reviews.text:
Hidden gem in Eco Bonatic especially if you like Si Chuan food. This restaurant was closed for almost 2 years and now that they reopened, the food tasted better than before.

My personal favourites are their "Ma Po To Fu" È∫ªÂ©ÜË±ÜËÖê and cabbage ÊâãÊíïÂåÖËèú„ÄÇ"Salted vegetable fish" ÈÖ∏ËèúÈ±º is pretty nice too and they are one of the few places around here with Qing Dao Beer ÈùíÂ≤õÂï§ÈÖí.

Haven't get to try all their dishes cause I usually pick those few favourites.
One of the best China Cuisine in JB area. I like all their dish. The taste is impress me, and they have a variety of it. Worth to visit once a month. Must try their beef.

The food is rather pricey, it‚Äôs below expectations. We ordered the sweet and sour pork loin and the the portion is very pathetic. Taste wise is very average. I would not recommend anyone to eat at this place. Any other food place at eco botanic would win this eatery hands down. Please don‚Äôt get cheated here.

Food very expensive,but big portion , trying sour fish soup  ÈÖ∏ËèúÈ±ºÔºåtaste not bad , quite spicy ,but waitress not friendly, should be new renovate shop but have no idea why the chairs and table broken and looks old üòÇ
Very delicious food for CHUAN cuisine, like it so much and strong recommend.
